channel.title: CVE Feed for github.com/go-yaml/yaml -- github.com/go-yaml/yaml
channel.description: The latest CVEs for github.com/go-yaml/yaml -- github.com/go-yaml/yaml

item.title: CVE-2021-4235|2024-08-03T17:23:09.096Z -- github.com%2Fgo-yaml%2Fyaml -- github.com%2Fgo-yaml%2Fyaml
item.description: Due to unbounded alias chasing, a maliciously crafted YAML file can cause the system to consume significant system resources. If parsing user input, this may be used as a denial of service vector.
